page.title: 06A Day in my Life.
page.content:
{by Mervyn Davies.}
I get up in the morning at five past seven. I get dressed and come down stairs to have my breakfast. I watch television for half an hour. I get my things ready for school then go and wait until the taxi comes to take me to school. When we get to school we have the register marked then we start work. We do lots of different things such as swimming,maths,English,theme work,religious education and games. We go home at half past three then I usually ride my bike until about four o'clock.I go to watch television and have my tea. I go to bed about half past eight to nine o'clock.
